remarks: Implicit substitution of a value of a function into a wff.  (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 1-Aug-2011.)
statement:
fveqsb.2 $e |- ( x = ( F ` A ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
fveqsb.3 $e |- F/ x ps $.
fveqsb $p |- ( E! y A F y -> ( ps <-> E. x ( A. y ( A F y <-> y = x ) /\ ph ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d F x y $.
